information_architecture.navigation_structure: Bottom tab navigation with 5 primary sections: Dashboard, Transactions, Envelopes, Insights, Settings. Modal overlays for focused tasks like receipt scanning and transaction entry.
information_architecture.user_flow_patterns: Primary flow: Dashboard overview → Quick transaction entry → Envelope assignment. Secondary flow: Envelope management → Budget allocation → Progress tracking. Tertiary flow: Analytics insights → Goal setting → Financial planning.

wireframes.layout_description: Clean envelope-centric layout with current balance summary, envelope progress cards, and floating action button for quick transaction entry. Header shows total budget health with visual progress indicator.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Swipe between envelope cards, tap cards to drill down, pull-to-refresh for data updates, long-press for quick actions
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: Large touch targets (44x44pt minimum), VoiceOver support for all elements, high contrast envelope colors, screen reader announcements for balance changes

wireframes.layout_description: Modal presentation with simplified form design. Amount entry with large keypad, merchant field with autocomplete suggestions, envelope assignment picker, and optional receipt camera integration.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Modal slide-up presentation, smart suggestions based on merchant history, haptic feedback on amount entry, swipe down to dismiss
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: Clear form field labels, logical tab order, error state announcements, alternative text input for speech recognition

wireframes.layout_description: Visual envelope grid with customizable icons and colors. Each envelope shows allocated amount, spent amount, and remaining balance with progress visualization. Drag-and-drop money allocation interface.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Tap envelope to expand details, drag to reorder, pinch to resize allocation amounts, long-press for edit options
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: Clear envelope labeling, alternative interaction methods for drag-and-drop, spoken feedback for balance changes

wireframes.layout_description: Full-screen camera interface with receipt detection overlay. Real-time OCR processing with editing interface for extracted data confirmation and correction.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Auto-focus on receipt detection, tap to capture, swipe between OCR result fields, shake to reset capture
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: Voice guidance for camera positioning, manual entry fallback, high contrast detection overlay

wireframes.layout_description: Analytics dashboard with spending trend charts, envelope performance metrics, and goal progress tracking. Interactive charts allow drilling down into specific time periods and categories.
wireframes.interaction_patterns: Tap chart segments for details, swipe between time periods, pull-to-refresh for updated data, long-press for sharing options
wireframes.accessibility_considerations: Chart data tables for screen readers, simplified chart descriptions, alternative data presentation formats

design_system.color_scheme: Privacy-focused palette with calming blues and greens as primary colors, warm accent colors for positive financial actions (savings, goals), subtle warning colors for low balances. High contrast ratios (4.5:1 minimum) for accessibility compliance.
design_system.typography: San Francisco (iOS) / Roboto (Android) system fonts with clear hierarchy. Large, readable text sizes (minimum 16pt body text). Clear distinction between headings, body text, and numerical data with appropriate weights.
design_system.component_library: Native platform components with custom envelope visualization widgets. Consistent button styles, form elements, and navigation patterns. Unified spacing system based on 8pt grid for consistent layouts.
design_system.responsive_approach: Mobile-first design with larger devices using expanded layouts. Tablet mode shows side-by-side views for envelope management and transaction entry. Progressive disclosure on smaller screens.

accessibility.color_contrast: 4.5:1 minimum ratio for all text and UI elements
accessibility.touch_targets: 44x44 points minimum for all interactive elements

design_patterns.navigation_compliance: Bottom tab navigation following platform conventions
design_patterns.interaction_standards: Standard gestures and touch patterns for platform familiarity

privacy_compliance.permission_requests: Clear explanations for camera and file access
privacy_compliance.trust_indicators: Visible data security and privacy assurances
